name: base-tooltip
title: Base Tooltip
description: A popup that appears when an element is hovered or focused, showing a hint for sighted users.

default.content: relative bg-primary text-primary-foreground shadow-md w-fit rounded-md px-3 py-1.5 text-sm text-balance
default.arrow: bg-primary fill-primary z-50 size-2.5 data-[side='bottom']:-top-[4px] data-[side='right']:-left-[4px] data-[side='left']:-right-[4px] data-[side='inline-start']:-right-[4px] data-[side='inline-end']:-left-[4px] rotate-45 rounded-[2px]

shadcn-default.content: relative bg-popover border text-popover-foreground shadow-md overflow-hidden w-fit rounded-md px-3 py-1.5 text-sm text-balance

shadcn-new-york.content: relative bg-primary text-primary-foreground shadow-md w-fit rounded-md px-3 py-1.5 text-xs text-balance
shadcn-new-york.arrow: bg-primary fill-primary z-50 size-2.5 data-[side='bottom']:-top-[4px] data-[side='right']:-left-[4px] data-[side='left']:-right-[4px] data-[side='inline-start']:-right-[4px] data-[side='inline-end']:-left-[4px] rotate-45 rounded-[2px]
